function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact on people-intensive service businesses due to COVID-19","Impact":"Severe disruptions to global economy, bankruptcy of small and iconic brands, firms on life support","Mitigation":"Adaptation of business models, seeking cash bailouts, innovating for survival","Technologies":"Digital platforms for online services, social distancing measures, online education and marketing","People":"Small and large businesses, employees, customers","Owner":"Business owners, government, health authorities"},{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 in society","Impact":"Severe disruptions to global economy, bankruptcy of small and iconic brands, firms on life support","Mitigation":"Vaccination, social distancing, adherence to health guidelines","Technologies":"Vaccines, digital contact tracing, telemedicine","People":"General public, at-risk individuals, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, health authorities, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Innovation in business models to cope with the pandemic","Impact":"Disruptions to traditional business models, shift towards online services and education","Mitigation":"Adapting business models, investing in online platforms, enhancing customer engagement","Technologies":"Digital platforms, online education tools, social media engagement","People":"Business owners, customers, employees","Owner":"Business owners, technology companies"}]}
